text: The 2019 Grambling State Tigers football team represents Grambling State University in the 2019 NCAA Division I FCS football season. The Tigers are led by sixth-year head coach Broderick Fobbs and play their home games at Eddie Robinson Stadium in Grambling, Louisiana as members of the West Division of the Southwestern Athletic Conference (SWAC). ==Previous season== The Tigers finished the 2018 season 6–5, 4–3 in SWAC play to finish tied for second place in the West Division. Prairie View ==Preseason== ===Recruiting class=== Reference: |} ===Preseason polls=== The SWAC released their preseason poll on July 16, 2019. The Tigers were picked to finish in third place in the West Division. {| class="wikitable" style="display: inline-table;" |+West Division |- align="center" |- align="center" | 1 || Southern || 90 |- align="center" | 2 || Prairie View A&M; || 78 |- align="center" | 3 || Grambling State || 74 |- align="center" | 4 || Texas Southern || 34 |- align="center" | 5 || Arkansas–Pine Bluff || 24 |} {| class="wikitable" style="display: inline- table;" |+East Division |- align="center" | 1 || Alcorn State || 92 |- align="center" | 2 || Alabama A&M; || 70 |- align="center" | 3 || Jackson State || 61 |- align="center" | 4 || Alabama State || 47 |- align="center" | 5 || Mississippi Valley State || 30 |} ===Preseason all–SWAC teams=== The Tigers placed four players on the preseason all–SWAC teams. Offense 2nd team William Waddell – OL Defense 1st team Anferenee Mullins – DL Joseph McWilliams – DB 2nd team Daquarian Williams – DB ==Roster== ==Schedule== *The Alabama A&M; and Jackson State games are scheduled as non-conference games despite being members of the same conference.
